title: rune pages and item sets no longer work
body: Item sets and rune pages are no longer working. Can't make any changes. What's up with that? Anyone else having same issue since new update?

replies.body:
This could be happening for a few reasons, that include third party programs not interacting well with league or a corrupt config folder.  As a first step, disable any apps you might be running like play.tv.  If the issue persists, resetting your config to default should help:

 **Log into the game** then hop into **a custom game**. *Alt+Tab* out of the match, then navigate to your League installation folder, which should be in C:\Riot Games\League of Legends

Delete the folder named **Config**

Once you've deleted the folder, leave the custom match. You'll then want to hop into another custom match to confirm the changes were saved.

Hopefully, that will get things fixed up!

i tried this and it didn't work. I even deleted the game and reloaded the entire thing. Still same problem. Rune pages and Item sets cannot be changed. This is really frustrating as I have a new character i want to play but can't get runes to work. Not sure what else to do.
